attributes.action: Give Free prescriptions to people with parkinson's disease and related illnesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Medication for Parkinson's, Multiple System Atrophy and Progressive Supranuclear Palsy has to be paid for by the unfortunate people who have to live with these debilitating illnesses and who are unable to qualify for free prescriptions. They should qualify automatically for free prescriptions because these illness affect their whole lives and sometimes from a young age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
